resources.string: By tapping Continue, your payment will be charged to your Google Play account, and your subscription will automatically renew for the same package length at the same price until you cancel in settings in the Google play store. By tapping Continue button, you agree to our terms.

Easily delete unwanted files like photos or videos. "\n"Keeps your storage space organized and clutter-free. "\n"Prevents accidentally deleted files by providing a safety net.
